name: Hobo Home (GGJ 2019)
description:
Discover treasures in the trash and create a place that you can call home.

How to Play:

The dumpster will be filled every minute with items that you can pick from to decorate your alley.

The hobo will also walk around and interact with objects!

Discover unique object interactions and try to find all the different ways to utilize the sandbox mechanics, in order to make your very own cozy Hobo Home.

Controls:

- Click on dumpster to search through it.

- Drag objects to move them.

- Rotate objects with mouse wheel.
